title: Covid-19 live updates: WHO Europe head says vaccine booster shots 'not a luxury' and help protect the vulnerable
content:
1. Covid-19 live updates: WHO Europe head says vaccine booster shots 'not a luxury' and help protect the vulnerable  The Washington Post
  2. WHO warns of 236,000 more COVID deaths in Europe by December  Al Jazeera English
  3. Coronavirus booster shots 'not a luxury', WHO Europe head says  reuters.com
  4. COVID surge in Europe 'deeply worrying' as vaccination slows, WHO says  Euronews
  5. Schools across Europe must stay open, say WHO and Unicef  The Guardian
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Covid-19 live updates: WHO Europe head says vaccine booster shots 'not a luxury' and help protect the vulnerable  The Washington Post

localize.title: Covid-19ライブアップデート。WHOヨーロッパ代表、ワクチンの追加接種は「贅沢ではない」「弱者を守るのに役立つ」と発言
Covid-19现场更新。世卫组织欧洲负责人表示，疫苗加强针 "不是奢侈品"，有助于保护弱势群体
Covid-19現場更新。世衛組織歐洲負責人表示，疫苗加強針 "不是奢侈品"，有助於保護弱勢羣體
